info.brief_description: orochimaru morphs/possesses his way into konoha/the akatsuki
info.description:
in this story orochimaru decides to use his new morph/possesion powers to infiltrate either Konaha or the akatsuki. the way he can do this are the following:
-morph by killing them then touching your hand to their face.(note:when you morph you can peel the skin off and turn it into a suit)
-possess people by stretching his entire body over a person, then sinking into them.( he is like goo)
-you can possess someone by biting their neck and after one day, they turn into a hollow shell to take over
-he turns into either a snake or liquid.
-turn into a spirit
10/17/10- you can now turn into a persons article of clothing and possess them of you choosing when you do that.

note- after he possesses someone he can turn them into his slave who do whatever he wants. also this is based during the shippuden.
If you have a good idea for a new method, just email me.
